name: entity_risk
description: Stores information related to the risk score of an entity.

children.name: detections_count
children.description: Number of detections that make up the risk score within the time window.

children.name: first_detection_time
children.description: Timestamp of the first detection within the specified time window.

children.name: last_detection_time
children.description: Timestamp of the last detection within the specified time window.

children.name: normalized_risk_score
children.description: Normalized risk score for the entity. This value is between 0-1000.

children.name: raw_risk_delta
children.description: The change in raw risk score for an entity between time windows.

children.name: risk_delta
children.description: The change in normalized risk score for an entity between time windows.

children.name: risk_score
children.description: Raw risk score for the entity.

children.name: risk_version
children.description: Version of the risk score calculation algorithm.

children.name: risk_window
children.description: Time window used when computing the risk score for an entity.

children.name: risk_window_size
children.description: Risk window duration for the Entity (e.g., '86400s').
